title: REST API via Amazon API Gateway, acting as Amazon SNS proxy with SNS Filter Policy
description: This pattern sets up a REST API via API Gateway as an SNS proxy, triggering Lambda functions with MessageBody filtering.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern leverages the Serverless Framework to deploy a REST API via Amazon API Gateway, functioning as an Amazon SNS proxy. It incorporates SNS Filter Policy for triggering Lambda functions based on MessageBody filters. Additionally, it enables CloudWatch Logs and X-Ray tracing for both API Gateway and Lambda through the Powertools for AWS Lambda developer toolkit.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
